{{Description|Stars shatter. Silence falls.}}
'''Starshatter''' is [[Ningguang]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|icd|Gem DMG}}
* When [[Jade Screen]] is nearby, 6 additional gem projectiles are launched. In an open area, 1 to 2 gems will hit the ground. It's not recommended to use the Burst in a confined space, because the gems are likely blocked by obstacles.
* This skill fires 6 gems without Jade Screen nearby and fires 12 gems with Jade Screen nearby.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Majesty Be the Array of Stars}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Grandeur Be the Seven Stars}}
